aboutUs.label: ABOUT US
aboutUs.title: Best Online Quran Academy
aboutUs.paragraph1: Noorulfurqan Academy is an educational platform specialized in teaching the Holy Quran and understanding its meanings in an innovative and simplified way that suits everyone.
aboutUs.paragraph2: The academy was established 5 years ago, and we succeeded in attracting 70% of our students through personal lessons that have evolved to provide integrated educational services via the Internet.
aboutUs.paragraph3: We rely on the TeacherOn platform, Facebook ads, and personal recommendations in our communication with customers, and we provide a distinguished educational experience through groups dedicated to each student to provide daily support, performance reports, and all educational resources.
aboutUs.paragraph4: We aim to attract students through introductory videos and customer experiences, in addition to free lectures during religious occasions.
aboutUs.paragraph5: Despite the challenges of competing with traditional academies, we are committed to our mission of spreading the teachings of the Holy Quran to everyone who aspires to learn it, while taking into account the financial circumstances of our customers and providing a high-quality educational experience.

servicesSection.title: Our Services
servicesSection.subtitle: Learn, recite, and live the Quran and Islamic knowledge beautifully

service1.title: Memorizing the Quran
service1.description: Learn and memorize the Quran easily, focusing on correct pronunciation, establishing your letter articulation and correct reading.

service2.title: Improving Recitation
service2.description: Regular listening and review sessions to enhance memorization and improve recitation. We help memorizers and readers review their recitation accurately, while alerting them to errors.

service3.title: Teaching Tajweed and Qira’at
service3.description: We focus on enabling the student to read the Qur’an with all the rules of Tajweed in a perfect manner.

service4.title: Teaching Arabic Language
service4.description: Distinguished education for children and adults in Arabic basics with training in reading and writing.

service5.title: Giving Briefings and Certificates
service5.description: Qualified teachers and supervisors provide the best education and modern scientific knowledge.

service6.title: Unlimited Scheduling
service6.description: We provide male and female teachers around the clock to assist students in memorizing and learning.

service7.title: Islamic Studies
service7.description: Explore Islamic sciences including jurisprudence and the Prophet’s biography.

service8.title: Aqeedah
service8.description: Learn the fundamentals of Islamic belief in a simplified way to strengthen your faith.

service9.title: Prayer Education
service9.description: Master prayer performance step by step to enhance your connection with Allah.
